string-array.name: food_name
string-array.item: Classic Margherita Pizza
Vegetable Stir-Fry
Classic Caesar Salad
Spaghetti Carbonara
Chicken Curry
Beef Tacos
Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
Banana Bread
Caprese Salad
Chocolate Chip Cookies

string-array.name: food_ingredients
string-array.item: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, olive oil, salt
Mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots), soy sauce, garlic, ginger, olive oil
Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing
Spaghetti, pancetta or bacon, eggs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, olive oil, black pepper
Chicken pieces, curry powder, coconut milk, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, oil
Ground beef, taco seasoning, taco shells, lettuce, cheese, salsa, sour cream
Shrimp, pasta, lemon, garlic, olive oil, parsley, red pepper flakes
Ripe bananas, flour, sugar, egg, butter, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract
Fresh mozzarella cheese, tomatoes, basil, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, pepper
Flour, baking soda, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips

string-array.name: food_preparation
string-array.item: Roll out pizza dough, spread tomato sauce, add slices of mozzarella. Bake at 475°F (245°C) for 10-15 minutes. Garnish with basil and a drizzle of olive oil
Sauté garlic and ginger in olive oil, add vegetables, stir-fry until tender. Add soy sauce and cook for another minute
Toss chopped romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, add croutons and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese
Cook spaghetti, sauté pancetta and garlic, combine with beaten eggs and cheese, toss with hot spaghetti
Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, add chicken and curry powder, cook until browned. Add coconut milk and tomato, simmer until chicken is cooked
Cook beef with taco seasoning, assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream
Cook pasta, sauté shrimp with garlic and red pepper flakes, add lemon juice. Mix with pasta and garnish with parsley
Mash bananas, mix with melted butter, add sugar, egg, and vanilla. Add flour, baking soda, salt, pour into a loaf pan, bake at 350°F (175°C) for 1 hour
Slice mozzarella and tomatoes, layer with basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, season with salt and pepper
Mix flour, baking soda, salt. Cream butter, sugars, add vanilla and eggs. Mix with dry ingredients, add chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls on baking sheet, bake at 375°F (190°C) for 8-10 minutes
